node.title: Trump is back in the White House — on the Bidens' Christmas tree
node.alt: A woman wearing a pink coat waves in front of a huge Christmas tree.
node.description: Former US president Donald Trump has made it back into the White House — at least in the form of a picture hanging on the Bidens' Christmas tree.
node.content:
["Former US president Donald\u00a0Trump\u00a0has made it back into the White House \u2014\u00a0at least in the form of a picture hanging on the Bidens' Christmas\u00a0tree.", "It is no exaggeration to say there is bad blood between the Trumps and Bidens, largely because Mr\u00a0Trump\u00a0continues to push his unprecedented attempt to persuade Americans that Joe Biden did not really beat him in the 2020 presidential election.", "But first lady Jill Biden's Gifts from the Heart\u00a0theme for this year's Christmas decorations is delivering seasonal goodwill.", "A gold-framed photo of Mr Trump\u00a0and his wife Melania hangs on the\u00a0tree\u00a0in the State Dining Room, along with snaps of the Obamas, the families of both presidents Bush, the Reagans and the Carters.", "Democrats Bill and Hillary Clinton also get a place on the presidential family\u00a0tree.\u00a0", "", "
The photo of the former president and first lady hangs on the tree.(AFP: Andrew Caballero-Reynolds)
", "More photos of former first families, again including Mr Trump, decorate a hallway. Hanging on another wall are framed holiday greetings cards from Mr Biden, Mr Obama and Mr Trump.", "The Christmas truce of sorts contrasts with the bitter relationship between the Trumps and Bidens.", "After Mr Biden's victory, Mr and Ms Trump\u00a0scratched the longstanding traditional invitation to tea that outgoing presidents and first ladies extend to their replacements.", "In another disruption to the more genteel customs of the White House, Mr Trump\u00a0never hosted his Democratic predecessor Barack Obama for an official portrait unveiling.", "The Republican has also yet to have his own portrait hung up in Mr Biden's White House.", "AFP"]
